sugarlib.config.save_and_exit.read_only:
§cThis config is read-only.§r
If you are on a server, this most likely means you don't have permission from the server administrator(s) to edit this config. If you want to edit your local config, you must not be on a multiplayer server.
sugarlib.config.reset.before_edit.hover: Reverts the change to the previous set value, before you edited it.
sugarlib.config.reset.original.hover: Resets the change to the default value.
sugarlib.config.slow_load: Loading the config is taking a little longer than usual.
sugarlib.config.limiter.string_bounds.mi: The value must be at least %s characters, found %s.
sugarlib.config.limiter.string_bounds.ma: The value must be at most %s characters, found %s.
sugarlib.config.limiter.number_bounds.mi: The value must be at least %s, found %s.
sugarlib.config.limiter.number_bounds.ma: The value must be at most %s, found %s.
sugarlib.config.server_config_editing_so: Server configs currently cannot be edited from the client, but this feature is coming soon!
